alert.note: Alert for Gove; Greeley; Logan; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 10:59PM CDT until June 10 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wichita County in west central Kansas... Southern Logan County in west central Kansas... Greeley County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM MDT/1130 PM CDT/. * At 958 PM MDT/1058 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Scott State Lake to near Leoti to 10 miles southeast of Towner, moving southeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Wichita, southern Logan, Greeley and southwestern Gove Counties, including the following locations... Lydia, The Monument Rocks, Selkirk and Marienthal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
